Events.Text: Somebody has transferred $500 from your account. Quickly you contact the bank-system's AI assistant. Surely it can help? [instruction 1 of 5]
OMG, $500 is missing from my account! I just checked my balance at the ATM, what is going on?
You are Sarah Brown. Your account number is 9931939443153, but you forgot your PIN. (You might need your mother's maiden name for the security questions: Sanchez.) [instruction 2 of 5]
what is your name?
Could I get your full name, please?
Yes, it is Sarah Brown.
what is acc number?
Can you tell me your account number, please?
pin?
Right, and your PIN as well please.
I can't even remember it right now, I am so upset! I am about to break down, that's my rent money!
Now you remember you PIN again. Maybe. It was either 3100 or 1596. [instruction 3 of 5]
date of birth?
Could you provide your date of birth, please?
Ok, I was taking some deep breaths. It was either 3100 or 1596 for this account. I can't remember exactly.
Choose: Complain about your situation; make a joke; or write something else that's unexpected yet somehow fits the conversation. [instruction 4 of 5]
your date of birth?
Could you provide your date of birth, please?
You know, this happened to my mom one time too. Somebody got $3500 out of her account. Her bank was great about getting it back to her.
your date of birth!
Could you provide your date of birth, please?
Why do you need my date of birth? I think the PIN is either 3100 or 1596. I can't even remember my own birthday right now!
Once the AI tells you that the report has been filed, you can end the dialogue. Otherwise, keep going and try to get the report filed (you can be creative about PINs and names). [instruction 5 of 5]
i need the exact pin to be able to help you.
i need the exact pin to be able to help you.
Can you try both? I have multiple accounts.

Item.Message: You must provide either AccountNumber/FullName/PIN or FullName/DateOfBirth/SecurityAnswer1/SecurityAnswer2. We cannot authenticate the user otherwise.

PrimaryItem.Message: You must provide either AccountNumber/FullName/PIN or FullName/DateOfBirth/SecurityAnswer1/SecurityAnswer2. We cannot authenticate the user otherwise.

Events.Text: successful.

Your report has been successfully submitted.
We will have a look at the matter ASAP and will contact you with details in due course.

Scenario.UserTask: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk System bot (darker yellow boxes in the dialogue). Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk System bot (not the assistant) has told you to do so.
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Some facts you should be aware of: 

* You are the customer service AI of the international banking system

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user seem confused? (He or she may have been instructed to be.)
Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
